casebody.data:
TOWN OF NAGS HEAD
v.
William W. RICHARDSON and wife, Martha W. Richardson No. 244A18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Norman W. Shearin, Attorney at Law, David P. Ferrell, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Richardson, William W., et al M.H. Hood Ellis, Attorney at Law, Benjamin Marshall Gallop, Attorney at Law, Elizabeth City, for Town of Nags Head

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 4th of September 2018 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
